description: After a fresh canape recipe you can whip up in a hurry? These lettuce cups filled with prosciutto and juicy mango are ready in just 10 minutes.
keywords: Canap√©s,Seafood free,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Spring,Nov 2021,Sesame free,Quick & easy,Summer,Christmas,Soy free,Wheat free,Mango,Peanut free
name: Mango, Prosciutto & Gem Lettuce Canapes Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 2 Calypso mangoes, peeled, cut into 1cm cubes
2 tbs Woolworths extra virgin olive oil
0.25 bunch mint, leaves picked, finely chopped (plus extra leaves to serve)

recipeInstructions.text: Place mango and prosciutto in a medium bowl and toss gently to combine. Divide mango mixture among lettuce leaves.
Whisk remaining ingredients together in a small jug. Season with pepper. Spoon dressing over mango mixture. Serve topped with extra mint leaves.
